Package org.apache.spark.network.shuffle.protocol

Class ExecutorShuffleInfo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.spark.network.shuffle.protocol.ExecutorShuffleInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.spark.network.protocol.Encodable
public class ExecutorShuffleInfo extends Object implements org.apache.spark.network.protocol.Encodable
Contains all configuration necessary for locating the shuffle files of an executor.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final String[]
    localDirs
    The base set of local directories that the executor stores its shuffle files in.
    final String
    shuffleManager
    Shuffle manager (SortShuffleManager) that the executor is using.
    final int
    subDirsPerLocalDir
    Number of subdirectories created within each localDir.

  • Field Details

    • localDirs

      public final String[] localDirs
      The base set of local directories that the executor stores its shuffle files in.

    • subDirsPerLocalDir

      public final int subDirsPerLocalDir
      Number of subdirectories created within each localDir.

    • shuffleManager

      public final String shuffleManager
      Shuffle manager (SortShuffleManager) that the executor is using. If this string contains semicolon, it will also include the meta information for push based shuffle in JSON format. Example of the string with semicolon would be: SortShuffleManager:{"mergeDir": "mergeDirectory_1", "attemptId": 1}
